items.sentence: It was wise for you not to follow Tom's advice.
What other sights are there to see in the city?
You should listen to what Tom is saying to you.
Do you think you can finish doing that by 2:30?
Please come back in half an hour to pick it up.
One of my shoes is here. Where's the other one?
There might be more butter in the refrigerator.
You should thank Tom the next time you see him.
I'll have Tom call you as soon as he gets back.
Tom planned a surprise birthday party for Mary.
